character.description: Ten-Thousand Vajra Ball Bodhisattva is http://anidb.net/ch1657 [Kondou Isao]`s ballsack and http://anidb.net/ch1169 [Shimura Tae]`s http://anidb.net/ch96892 [guardian spirit]`s guardian spirit, formed from the thousands of "sticky eggs" that Kondou Isao wrapped in tissues and "killed".

character.name: Madao
character.description: Madao is divine guardian spirit, created when a "http://anidb.net/ch1655 [fly]" joined the Guardian Fusion between http://anidb.net/ch96889 [Asuraman] and http://anidb.net/ch96890 [Alchu]. Currently unemployed. Since Hasegawa Taizou was a guardian spirit of his own shades, his "powers" merged with the ones other two had before fusion, meaning that current merger is an unemployed alcoholic that can only communicate with a whiteboard.

character.name: Megane-ya no Shujin
character.description: He`s the owner of the glasses store who gave http://anidb.net/ch1163 [Shinpachi] the cursed glasses that allowed him to see spirits. It turned out that he was actually his guardian spirit, residing in his old, broken glasses.

character.name: Corolla ja Nai. Katsulla Da
character.description: Katsulla, Not Corolla is http://anidb.net/ch1165 [Katsura Kotarou]`s guardian spirit. When he got in a traffic accident, his soul was split in two. One half entered a Corolla, and the other was bound to hell, but was given a ride to his body by the Corolla and safely made it through. Ever since, he kept the spirit of the car around even after it went out of service, used it to escape in emergencies, and came to be known as "Runaway Kotarou". In return for that power, he would be put under the "Katsura, Not Zura" curse, meaning he had to always drag the Corolla around with his hair and abuse his hair roots too the limit. Source: Crunchyroll

character.name: Maserati Ja Nee Mayorati Da
character.description: Mayorati, Not Maserati is http://anidb.net/ch1167 [Hijikata Toushirou]`s guardian spirit, the spirit of a rich man`s Maserati he ruined by pouring mayonnaise in its tank as a prank back when he was a bad boy. Due to that, he was put under the "Mayorati" curse, meaning he has to intake mayonnaise at regular intervals. He was also put under the "V-Shaped Bangs" curse, meaning his bangs are always pulled by a Maserati, putting him at risk of balding. Source: Crunchyroll

character.name: Doesu Sadist
character.description: Tormenting Sadist is http://anidb.net/ch1168 [Okita Sougo]`s guardian spirit. After he tricked http://anidb.net/ch1167 [Hijikata Toshirou] into pouring mayonnaise into Maserati, Sougo was tied up and left deep in the mountains, where he found the darkness within him. Ever since, his "guardian spirit" was stuck in Toshirou`s body, sucking up his life force. Source: Crunchyroll

character.name: Toilet no Kamisama
character.description: God of Toilets is http://anidb.net/ch1166 [Elizabeth]`s guardian spirit, a god he gave birth to in order to escape reality while cleaning the toilet. It has a power to clean up all impurities, whether the toilet is Japanese or Western style. Source: Crunchyroll

character.name: Ranbubiyo
character.description: Rumblee is the main protagonist of the Tales of Madao Hazard, the game added to the "original" Gintama game, revised by http://anidb.net/ch7827 [Tama] with http://anidb.net/ch1162 [Gintoki]`s guidance. In game, Rumblee came to Edo, looking for http://anidb.net/ch93102 [her brother] who became a zombie NEET.

character.name: Kusatta Gurasan (38)
character.description: Rotten Shades (38) is a monster in Tales of Rumble, the game derived from the "original" Gintama game.

character.name: Norowa Retaa Megane
character.description: Curr Sedd Glasses are the glasses that let the wearer see through all the world`s truths clearly and distinctly, all of nature and creation. They were given to http://anidb.net/ch1163 [Shinpachi] by the http://anidb.net/ch96904 [owner of a certain glasses store] as a temporary replacement for his broken ones.

character.name: Shijaku
character.description: Shijaku is an admiral of an unspecified nation, who joined Altana Liberation Army and became one of its leaders. His real name is Barkas and he is one of the three princes of planet Oukoku, other being his long lost young brother prince http://anidb.net/ch1677 [Hata], and his long lost older brother http://anidb.net/ch1166 [Dragonia]. Source: Gintama Wiki

character.name: Enshou
character.description: Enshou was the warrior prince of Burei, known as "The Gunpowder Prince". Following the Altana incident that destroyed his home planet, he joins the http://anidb.net/ch96930 [Altana Liberation Army] and becomes one of its leaders. However, he plans to destroy every last of Altana after an incident involving the death of his lover as part of his selfish suicide attempt. Unfortunately, his selfishness becomes a perfect subject and unwitting pawn to http://anidb.net/ch81990 [Utsuro]`s similar plan, until his defeat at the hands of http://anidb.net/ch1662 [Takasugi Shinsuke]. By the time he began to regret himself for betraying his own friends and lover, he is killed by one of his own men who is fed up of Enshou`s selfishness on sacrificing his own men to death. Source: Gintama Wiki

character.name: Soutatsu
character.description: Soutatsu is a warrior of the Shinra Tribe. He and his men worked for the http://anidb.net/ch96930 [Altana Liberation Army] in the mission to destroy planet Earth. Source: Gintama Wiki

character.name: Ougai
character.description: Ougai is a warrior of the Dakini Tribe. He and his men worked for the http://anidb.net/ch96930 [Altana Liberation Army] in the mission to destroy planet Earth. Source: Gintama Wiki

character.name: Dragonia
character.description: It is revealed that http://anidb.net/ch1166 [Elizabeth]`s real name is Dragonia, the eldest of the three Oukoku princes, other being his younger brothers http://anidb.net/ch96947 [Barkas] and http://anidb.net/ch96946 [Hata]. Source: Gintama Wiki

character.name: Hevandorogon
character.description: HEVA is an All-Purpose Demonoid Final Battle Weapon.

episode.title: 一つのかぞく
A Family
Une famille
Hitotsu no Kazoku
episode.summary: The gang discover the truth behind the old man and look to reunite him with Ikumatsu and her ramen. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一杯のラーメン
A Bowl of Ramen
Un bol de ramen
Ippai no Ramen
episode.summary: Katsura, upon hearing Ikumatsu`s story about an old man who used to visit her restaurant every New Year`s Eve, enlists the Odd Jobs` help to look for him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ハゲたお父さんと白髪のお父さんとお父さんのメガネ
My Bald Dad, My Light-Haired Dad, and My Dad`s Glasses
Le papa chauve, le papa aux cheveux blancs et les lunettes de papa
Hageta Otousan to Shiraga no Otousan to Otousan no Megane
episode.summary: Umibozu and Gintoki`s meeting with Kagura`s boyfriend Dai doesn`t go according to plan as he`s revealed to be the prince of Planet Titan. Meanwhile, the new couple`s relationship takes a drastic turn. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大人の階段は昇り階段とは限らない
The Stairs to Adulthood May Not Always Lead Up
Les marches vers l’âge adulte ne vont pas forcément vers le haut
Otona no Kaidan wa Nobori Kaidan to wa Kagiranai
episode.summary: Umibozu drops in to visit Kagura, but he and Gintoki get the shock of their lives when Kagura reveals she has a boyfriend now. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Ending 1
Opening 1
最強の剣と最低の鈍
The Strongest Sword, and the Dullest Sword
L`épée la plus puissante et le sabre émoussé
Saikyou no Ken to Saitei no Don
episode.summary: The Excaliburling story reaches its climax as Maganagi takes over Okita`s body and reveals the truth to Kusanagi. How will Gintoki respond? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ドSとドS
The Super Sadist and the Super Sadist
Sadique VS sadique
Do S to Do S
episode.summary: Kusanagi reveals the details of an old wound he received at the hands of the cursed sword, Maganagi, as Gintoki and Okita get ready for their duel. Meanwhile, Hijikata investigates Senbe the Manslayer. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 鞘をたずねて三千里
3000 Leagues in Search of a Scabbard
3 000 lieues à la recherche d`un fourreau
Saya o Tazunete Sanzenri
episode.summary: The Odd Jobs encounter a strange sword at Tetsuko`s smithy, and it grows attached (quite literally) to Gintoki`s behind! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 生と死のグラサン / 全ての答えは現場にある
Life, Death, and Shades / All the Answers Can Be Found in the Field
Les lunettes de soleil de la vie et de la mort / Toutes les réponses sont sur le terrain
Sei to Shi no Glasun / Subete no Kotae wa Genba ni Aru
episode.summary: Hasegawa has a life-or-death encounter with assassins, and the Shinsengumi and Mimawarigumi compete over solving a fictional case. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 神ゲーと糞ゲーは紙一重 / メガネは魂の一部
The Line Between Godlike Games and Shitty Games Is Paper-Thin / Glasses Are a Part of the Soul
Les jeux légendaires et les jeux merdiques diffèrent à peine
Kami Gee to Kuso Gee wa Kamihitoe / Megane wa Tamashii no Ichibu
episode.summary: In the first half, Gintoki decides that as protagonist, he can`t sit and do nothing as a Gintama game is released. He takes matters into his own hands as Odd Jobs looks to produce a superhit. In the second, Shinpachi buys a new pair of glasses that get him rather high spirits... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アイドルの勲章
An Idol`s Badge of Honor
La médaille d`une starlette
Idol no Kunshou
episode.summary: The battle at the Oedo Dome heats up as the fans waver between the two groups, but Otsu is still holed up indoors. Will she fade away, or will Shinpachi and gang rekindle her passion? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ダイヤモンドは傷つかない
Diamonds Are Unscratchable
Le diamant ne se brise pas
Diamond wa Kizutsukanai
episode.summary: Boogie Diamonds 48 has to deal with the sudden arrival of Galaxy Kingdom Bitches 48, who challenge them for the spot of Edo`s top idol! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 握手の前は手を洗え
Wash Your Hands Before a Handshake
Lave-toi les mains avant une poignée de main
Akushu no Mae wa Te o Arae
episode.summary: As group units take over the idol industry, Terakado Tsu must adapt or fall behind the times. But the idol she forms a combo unit with is... Kagura? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 守護霊も魂の一部
Guardian Spirits Are Also a Part of the Soul
Les esprits gardiens font aussi partie de l`âme
Shugorei mo Tamashii no Ichibu
episode.summary: The Kabuki District Sports Meet begins, and Shinpachi bears witness to the influence guardian spirits have on such events. Will he be able to fight through it and help Odd Jobs win the cash prize? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヤンキーの子供は襟足が長い
A Delinquent`s Kid Has Long Neck Hair
Les enfants de délinquants ont de longs cheveux couvrant leur nuque
Yankee no Kodomo wa Eriashi ga Nagai
episode.summary: With the Odd Jobs looking for the Tendoshu, things heat up on the Liberation Army`s main ship. Shijaku has promised his cooperation to Nobunobu, but now he must convince his comrades. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 調味料は控え目に
Flavoring Is Best in Small Quantities
L`assaisonnement s`use avec modération
Choumiryou wa Hikaeme ni
episode.summary: Katsura, Sakamoto, and Nobunobu arrive at the S.S. Heavenly Bird and try to bring the Liberation Army to the negotiating table. Meanwhile, the various factions in Edo begin to make their move. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天然パーマはグニャグニャ曲がっても戻ってくる
Try As You Might to Make a Natural Perm Go Away, It Will Always Return
Une permanente a beau être tortillée, elle revient toujours
Tennen Perm wa Gunyagunya Magatte mo Modotte Kuru
episode.summary: Utsuro`s master plan is in full effect as Earth is taken over by the Altana Liberation Army. With Odd Jobs still not back from Rakuyo, the residents of Kabuki District have a hard time adjusting to life as a colony. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 男は長くも太くもなく硬く生きろ
Men Must Live Not Long nor Thick, but Hard
Un homme ne doit pas avoir une vie longue ou grosse, mais ferme
Otoko wa Nagaku mo Futoku mo Naku Kataku Ikiro
episode.summary: Prince Hata`s past is revealed along with the history of Planet Okoku. Can Katsura and Hasegawa really get them on Earth`s side? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 無駄を覚えた機械を人間という
Machines That Pick Up Useless Habits Are Called People
Un humain est une machine ayant appris des choses inutiles
Muda o Oboeta Kikai o Ningen to Iu
episode.summary: The machines have done their part and left Earth`s future in the hands of humanity. But Gengai`s cannon has also painted a huge target on the Kabuki Distruct, and the Liberation Army immediately marches toward it. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 爺さんは忘れてはいけないものを皺に刻む
Geezers Carve the Things They Shouldn`t Forget into Their Wrinkles
Le papy plisse de rides ce qu`il ne doit pas oublier
Jii-san wa Wasurete wa Ikenai Mono o Shiwa ni Kizamu
episode.summary: The return of some familiar faces breathes new life into Earth`s resistance, but they`re as troublesome as they`ve always been! And when the Liberation Army brings out its big guns, it`s up to Gengai to respond. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: しぶといとしつこいは紙一重
The Line Between Tenacious and Annoying Is Paper-Thin
La différence entre tenace et lourd ne tient qu`à un fil
Shibutoi to Shitsukoi wa Kamihitoe
episode.summary: The encounter with Utsuro leaves Gintoki feeling more helpless than ever before. That`s when he receives a very powerful reminder. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 武士道とは一秒後に死ぬ事と見つけたり
Bushido Is Found One Second Before Death
La voie du guerrier s`entrevoit une seconde avant la mort
Bushidou to wa Byougo ni Shinu Koto to Mitsuketari
episode.summary: Gengai has gone missing, and Ensho has brought out his trump card. How can the Odd Jobs, the Shinsengumi, Katsura, Sakamoto, and Nobunobu get out of this desperate situation? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 平和と破滅は表裏一体
Peace and Destruction Are Two Sides of the Same Coin
Paix et ruine sont deux faces d`une même pièce
Heiwa to Hametsu wa Hyouriittai
episode.summary: After successfully driving the Liberation Army out of the Kabuki District, its residents enjoy a well-earned break. However, they know that the peace won`t last for long. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ジャンプはインフレしてなんぼ
Jump and Power Creep Go Hand-in-Hand
Combien y a-t-il eu d`inflation avec le Jump ?
Jump wa Infla Shite Nanbo
episode.summary: Under the leadership of the Kabuki District`s Four Devas, the residents are beginning to drive out the enemies inside the town. However, they still have to deal with Ougai, the leader of the Dakini force. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 昔の武勇伝は自分で話すと嫌われるので他人に話させろ
Bragging About Your Own Heroic Deeds Will Make People Hate You, So Make Others Do It for You
Parler de ses vieux exploits entraîne le mépris, alors fais-les raconter
Mukashi no Buyuuden wa Jibun de Hanasu to Kirawareru node Tanin ni Hanasasero
episode.summary: The Shinra finally make their move and look to capture the creator of the virus cannon with their underhand tactics. But right as things get desperate, the "boss" of the Kabuki District intervenes. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 鬼は一寸法師のような小粒に弱い
Ogres Are Weak Against Tiny Heroes Like the Inch-High Samurai
L`ogre est faible face aux minus comme le Petit Poucet
Oni wa Issunboushi no You na Kotsubu ni Yowai
episode.summary: The Kabuki District is under siege, and the fearsome Dakini race arrive on the scene. How can the District and its residents cope with this onslaught? Source: crunchyroll
